name: Cable Two Yule Log
description:
Merry Christmas! This is an interactive, retro-styled yule log program, themed around the many shows on twitch.tv/cabletwo.

I am unable to get Linux or Mac builds to work right now (sorry, Mikeo :( ).


Controls:

Mouse to click on buttons and objects (try hovering over items in the scene with your mouse! If they light up, try clicking on one!)

When in item inspect mode, you can use Q and E to rotate.

Exit and Credits can be highlighted, but in case that doesn't work, Esc. will work for Exit and Tab will work for credits. 

IMPORTANT DO NOT SKIP

Please lower your audio when you first start up the game because honestly i'm really bad at balancing audio and i'm worried its too loud

Sometimes after you click on an item and exit inspect mode, the items on the fireplace will no longer be interactive and i have no clue why. if you inspect the guitar, it'll fix it.

also um it has a lot of stuff in it that might make your computer very warm which one could argue makes it more realistic but also maybe dont run it if it does that lol

anyway i hope you like it :)
